title: Extinction Rebellion protests: Latest updates as activists target Westminster and Oxford Circus
text:
Extinction Rebellion protesters are set to spray paint red-handed prints onto government buildings in Westminster for the penultimate day of its latest round of protests to demand urgent action on the climate crisis.

It comes after the group apologised after protesters tried to stop trains on London’s tube network yesterday, only to be fiercely attacked by a mob.

Meanwhile other activists have blockaded Oxford Circus in defiance of a London-wide police ban on its protests.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.
